title: How to import Ghidra DB into IDA?
content: I see many questions about how to import IDA DB into Ghidra but I interesting in the backside. I want to export Ghidra DB and import it into Ida PRO. How I can do that?

answers_data.content: There is the $GHIDRA_ROOT/Extensions/IDAPro/Python/7xx/loaders/xml_loader.py script for IDA that loads the XML file into IDA. To create that XML file you need to use the ghidra.app.util.exporter.XmlExporter class.
